book.synopsis: This publication describes and explains advanced states of consciousness and the way to spiritual Enlightenment. It includes dialogues with spiritual students worldwide. For the first time, a cogent and verifiable means of confirmation of spiritual reality is provided via an objective, reduplicative method of measurement, based on physiologically derived clinical evidence.
book.title_long: The Eye of the I: From Which Nothing is Hidden
book.dimensions: Height: 8.38 inches, Length: 5.38 inches, Weight: 1 Pounds, Width: 0.78 inches
